chunk:
BioClarity Cleanse Keeping It Clean (2020 formulation)

Brand: bioClarity

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Water (aqua), sodium c14-16 olefin sulfonate, cocamidopropyl betaine, cocamidopropyl hydroxysultaine, acrylates copolymer, glycereth-2 cocoate, glycerin, cucumis sativus (cucumber) fruit extract, camellia oleifera (green tea) leaf extr

green tea) leaf extract, chamomilla recutita (matricaria) flower extract, phenoxyethanol, sodium chloride, benzoic acid, sodium hydroxide, potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate

Directions: Cleanse your skin of the day s dirt, oil, and makeup. Apply a nickel-sized dab to wet skin and use fingertips to massage with gentle, circular motions. Try massagi

motions. Try massaging for 60 seconds to leave your skin feeling super soft. Rinse with warm water and gently pat dry. Avoid getting in the eyes.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
